hasAttributes.name: PropertyLocationStatusId
hasAttributes.description: The unique identifier of a Property Location Status.

hasAttributes.name: PropertyLocationStatusName
hasAttributes.description: The name of the Property Location Status.

definitions.description:
The status of a specific Property Location.

Ex:
- Available
- Occupied
- Unavailable
- Capacity Available
- Over Capacity
